mapper.insert: insert into vacation (seq,team,role,vacationType,name, startDate,endDate,phone,subTeam,subRole,subName,work) values( (select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from vacation), #{team},#{role},#{vacationType},#{name},#{startDate}, #{endDate},#{phone},#{subTeam},#{subRole},#{subName},#{work} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, B.* FROM (SELECT seq, team, role, vacationType, name, startDate, endDate, phone, subTeam, subRole, subName, work, accept, reason FROM vacation ORDER BY seq DESC) B) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{page}*5-4 AND #{page}*5 AND name=#{name}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, B.* FROM (SELECT seq, team, role, vacationType, name, startDate, endDate, phone, subTeam, subRole, subName, work, accept, reason FROM vacation ORDER BY seq DESC) B) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{page}*5-4 AND #{page}*5
mapper.update: update vacation set accept=#{accept} where seq=#{seq}
update vacation set accept=#{refuse},reason=#{reason} where seq=#{seq}
